document.full_text: two conservation groups and a california resident have sued to stop construction of a sunpower corp solar power plant, saying the project would harm the rural area's wildlife, air quality and natural beauty.
document.title: groups sue to stop sunpower plant in california
lines_and_colors: two conservation groups and a california resident have sued to stop construction of a sunpower corp solar power plant, saying the project would harm the rural area's wildlife, air quality and natural beauty.
